articles.author: Jackson Payne
articles.title: 3 takeaways from BYU’s Big 12 championship game loss to Texas Tech - Deseret News
articles.description: The Cougars were bested 34-7 by Texas Tech in Saturday’s Big 12 championship game at AT&T Stadium in Arlington.
articles.content:
ARLINGTON, Texas There will be no conference crown for BYU this year.
The Cougars were bested 34-7 by Texas Tech in Saturdays Big 12 championship game at AT&T Stadium, suffering their second los… [+3405 chars]
